attributes.action: Pay workers in nursing home 80% of their wages if they test positive for Covid19
attributes.additional_details: Government or private companies should have to pay their nurses and care staff 80% of their wage if they test positive for COVID19 when they are looking after it at the work place.
attributes.background: Pay key workers such as nurse and care staff 80% of their wage if they are off sick with positive COVID when they are expected to work with cases in private companies.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

Ensure care workers get full pay from day one of Coronavirus-related absence:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307650
